title: I bet he's handsome and cool though
desc: A voice in the desert hollerin

panels.alt: A cowboy riding left to right, smoking. The sun is up and there are birds in the sky
panels.text:
They say there's a maniac 
 riding around the desert 
 on a horse
panels.hovertext: Maybe if I act like a maniac they'll feel more comfortable

panels.alt: A cowboy riding right to left, smoking. The moon is up and there are stars in the sky
panels.text:
I've been hollerin all day 
 haven't seen a soul
panels.hovertext: Maybe if I act like a maniac they'll feel more comfortable
